item.title: The UAE has a strong presence in LinkedIn's list of the top 100 most sought-after employers in EMEA for 2015
item.description:
Source: LinkedIn blog. LinkedIn has released its list of the 100 Most In-Demand Employers in Europe, the Middle East, and Africa for 2015. These rankings, showcasing the most sought-after companies in the region, are based on a comprehensive analysis of billions of professional interactions with companies on the LinkedIn platform. Nine companies from the UAE, the only Middle Eastern nation represented, secured a spot on the list. item.title: Dubai Islamic Bank has been included in LinkedIn's Most In-Demand Employers 2015 list for the MENA region
item.description:
Source: DIB. Dubai Islamic Bank (DIB), the leading Islamic bank in the UAE, has been acknowledged by LinkedIn as one of the most desirable employers in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region. item.title: The skills you possess will be valuable in securing future employment opportunities
item.description:
Legrand illustrates how LinkedIn is innovating by connecting existing skills with the needs of emerging jobs. During his keynote, “Job titles are out, skill sets are in,” at the Singapore Computer Society’s Tech3 Forum, Legrand stated that LinkedIn aims to connect its members not only with employers but also with suitable companies, relevant jobs, and essential skills for future career prospects...

item.title: The Zakat Fund in the UAE uses social media to inform and engage with the public
item.description:
To enhance public understanding of zakat and promote transparency, the UAE’s Zakat Fund is leveraging social media to engage with the public. According to H.H Abdullah ibn Aqeedah Al Muhairy, Secretary-General of the Zakat Fund, the organization is utilizing platforms like Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, and Google+. This allows the public to stay informed about current activities and initiatives, and provides an avenue for inquiries, announcements, and feedback. The Zakat Fund is responsible for collecting and distributing zakat and charitable donations according to the eight Islamic categories...

item.description:

This new addition to the ice system will launch in November and reflects Emirates’ dedication to offering passengers fresh and diverse entertainment options.
